DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to evaluate the health care resource utilization and work status of patients with ankylosing spondylitis undergoing treatment with etanercept by comparing study evaluations with the baseline evaluations in the ASCEND (0881A3-402)(NCT00247962) study.
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study Evaluating Etanercept in Ankylosing Spondylitis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Patients who completed 16 weeks of treatment and have completed the baseline health care resource utilization questionnaire at screening in the ASCEND study 0881A3402WW from participating countries. Exclusion criteria: Withdrawal from the ASCEND study for safety or any other reason.
